categories: Category:Star Wars: The High Republic Adventures

nodes.text: Star Wars: The High Republic Adventures

Star Wars: The High Republic Adventures is a comic book series written by Daniel José Older as part of the Star Wars: The High Republic multimedia project. It is published by IDW Publishing and began on February 3, 2021. The series focuses on a group of Padawans travelling the galaxy to learn the ways of the Jedi, being mentored by Yoda.
